subject: Re: Undelivered Mail Returned to Sender

full_threads.body:
Hi Darren,

We have updated the page. Let me know if this works for you?
https://shellshockedmedia.com/tyctaotv/

Hi mate,

There are 3 still not working.

Hi Darren,

Sure, We have updated the page as well.
https://shellshockedmedia.com/tyctaotv/

Hi mate 👍 thanks again.

I just went thru the whole thing.

Only problem I can see is the TYCTAOTV page.

Cheers

Hi Darren,

We have updated the site. It should be working fine now.
@joel Can you please take care of this one.

Hi Darren,

I'll ask the team to whip through and see what is going on. If it's something we have missed, we'll fix it no charge.

If it's something that has resulted from an update from YouTube or Vimeo, then it will be billable.

I'll update you ASAP.

action.text: Heath Maguire moved this conversation from the Unknown Mailbox inbox

full_threads.body:
Morning Heath,

A client called to say that there is something wrong with videos on the 'ShellShocked Media Mobile App'.

I had a look on my iPhone, there are videos on most pages that are showing half a thumbnail/video?

Is this repair covered or will it be part of ShellShocked's 2 hours a month?

Cheers.

Thanks for resending Darren, it must have been the embedded screenshots that were causing the email to bounce.

We have now made the updated. Perhaps moving forward if you can attached the screenshots versus embedding them in the email that will help. Thanks for your patience though!!

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body:
Hi mate its the following.




> HI Joel,
>
> The following was sent to Wolf IQ last week.
>
> Is there an ETA?
>
> On the ShellShocked Media ‘Corporate Social Media’ page
>
> I would like to change to change two titles please:
>
> 1. 'The Antoinettes Podcast Launch 2024’ change to 'The Antoinettes Podcast Launch 2024 Full Event Video'
￼
>
>
> 2.'DSI Hamilton Island 2023 Hot Stuff’ change to 'DSI Hamilton Island 2023 Event Video 3'
￼

>
> Also I would like ton add the following video to the same page:
>
> The Habit Revolution 2024 Event Video 1: https://vimeo.com/926903565?share=copy
>
> Between the following 2 videos.
>
￼

Darren Robinson
0417445075
https://shellshockedmedia.com

￼

Hi Darren,

Is there an attachment in your email by any chance? If so, how large is it and what file format is it?

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia ran the **Unknown Workflow** workflow
